amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide funding for long lead time materials to construct additional Virginia-class submarines in FY2022 and FY2023.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 115-785 to provide funding for long lead time materials to construct additional Virginia-class submarines in FY 2022 and FY 2023.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 267 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 267 (Roll no. 311).
